thing.action: local name = get_property(this, "name"); if name then notify(caller, "<brightblue>You see " .. name .. " here.\n"); end
local room = get_thing(caller, args); moveto(caller, room);
local name = get_property(caller, "name"); if (name) then do_action(this, "announce", -1, "<brightgreen>" .. name .. " leaves.\n"); end
local name = get_property(this, "name"); if name then notify(caller, "<brightmagenta>You can go " .. name .. "\n"); end
